sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"wiki"}}>{`Wiki`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"ideas-and-conecpts"}}>{`Ideas and Conecpts`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"models"}}>{`Models`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"department-box-folder"}}>{`Department, Box, Folder`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h5" components={components} props={{"id":"status"}}>{`Status`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Status is based on location of the item. With Folders it can also be based off of the location of the parent box IF the folder's current location is the box.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`if the current location begins with an 'L', the item is available.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`if the current location begins with a 'D', the item is checked out to a Department (which could be a different department from the one it belongs to i.e. the legal department can check out boxes from anywhere.)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`if there is no Location, the status is pending because the box has been submitted for creation by the department, but not yet physically created by the department. When the box is physically created by a courier, the location will be set indicating that it should be a candidate for checkout.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"configuring-local-environment"}}>{`Configuring local environment`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"running-locally"}}>{`Running locally`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Running locally lets you develop without any data from sharepoint or filemaker, just using mock data.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`From the root of the project, run:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-bash","metaString":""}}>{`    yarn run dev:local
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"running-with-sharepointproxy"}}>{`Running with sharepointProxy`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Running with a sharepoint proxy server allows us to access sharepoint api for whichever site the app was installed on as well as credentials.  This will also use a node proxy server for proxying requests to FileMaker.  This option option starts a proxy server for Sharepoint, a proxy server for FileMaker, and serves the webpack build.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"important-steps-to-run"}}>{`Important steps to run`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`You must be connected to BYU internet for the filemaker server to work correctly`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`You must generate credentials for Sharepoint, this is done by running `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`yarn run sp:proxyServer`}</MDXTag>{` and entering your credentials. `}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`When prompted, The correct url is "`}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://sp13-c3d12ebd09d206.spapps.byu.edu/jj33/Record_Request_App"}}>{`https://sp13-c3d12ebd09d206.spapps.byu.edu/jj33/Record_Request_App`}</MDXTag>{`"`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Select to use User Credentials`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`The domain is "byu"`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Every once in a while the credentials will expire, and you will need to run this command again.  It seems like they last at least 2 weeks.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`When all of this is done, run: `}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-bash","metaString":""}}>{`    yarn run dev:sharepointProxy
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag>
